channel.title: How to add banker.please help!
channel.description: i need to add a banker to a certain place how will i add it cuz i added 1 in autospawn and it shows up when i open up banker it says u can sell/buy items from him..help?

item.title: How to add banker.please help!
item.dc:creator: @rain1994 rain1994
item.description:
@rain1994 wrote:

[quote=“bobby1, post:7, topic:349395”][quote author=rain1994 link=topic=445765.msg3272184#msg3272184 date=1279295891]
I know what your problem is its your using the wroung banker ID try looking aroud your server for a banker that works then when you find him. Step right over him find your coords. then go into your autospawn file find the coords of the banker and you’ll see his npc id and there ya go you have the correct banker id
[/quote]haha tyvm i put in wrong id.[/quote]
ywvm! I nkew that was your problem ^.^

Read full topic

item.title: How to add banker.please help!
item.dc:creator: @Yeahhh Yeahhh
item.description:
@Yeahhh wrote:

Uhm… But On the Banker u Can’t Sell Items Just You Can Save The Item Only .
But Maybe You Mean Want To Add Shop !!
If You Want to Add Shop You Search For Npc Can Trade/Talk With Him If Trade/Talk With him open Window Then You Go To Source And Search For Config Folder And You Show Official Book Name : Shops And You ADD Item For Shop. !!!

Read full topic

item.title: How to add banker.please help!
item.dc:creator: @Yeahhh Yeahhh
item.description:
@Yeahhh wrote:

First Search For Id For The Banker , then Go Autospawn On The Source .
I Give You Example :

spawn = Here Id Of Banker Here Coord X Here Coord Y 0 0 0 0 0 1
